description: Manage the starboard in your server

detailedDescription.extendedHelp: Configuration and view my starboard module.
explainedUsage:
- **List (default)**: List the indexed starmessages in this server.
- **Show**: Display the full embed of a starmessage given it's ID.
The Id of the starmessage, usually found at the bottom of the star embed or can also be the message ID of the starmessage or original message.

name: starboard
